Html:
i am looking for a way to select a row by pressing a key (i.e. the key P)and it gives me all the rows that starts with P.

i'm new with wpf. can any body tell me what to do
Look at Items.Filter. Also, you will have to define what it means that "a row starts with P" in terms of your business object type so that you can implement the proper logic.
